blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
Moody: Listen, kid —
Lily: Please, call me Lily.
Moody: I’d really rather not. If I named you, I could get attached.
body:
Moody: Listen, kid —
Lily: Please, call me Lily.
Moody: I’d really rather not. If I named you, I could get attached.

blog.name: thepicassoofporkproducts
blog.title: The Pitiful Postulations of Past Post Products
blog.description: For a year before I joined tumblr i saved all the funny stuff I could find on my computer. Now I want to get rid of it all but don't want to loose it.Solution: Dump it all on tumblr. If you find the original post please contact me so I can reblog it to my main channel post-office-box-847 and then delete it here.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: hogwartshousefriends
blog.title: Hogwarts House Friends
blog.description: Greetings babes. I’m Anastasia. I have a special place in my heart for both Shakespeare and Harry Potter. Icon by @risuniku. If you need something tagged that I don't already tag let me know and I will do so.

summary:
Gryffindor: Why do you guys wake up so late? What time do you even sleep?
Hufflepuff: I fall asleep first because Ravenclaw...
body:
Gryffindor: Why do you guys wake up so late? What time do you even sleep?

Hufflepuff: I fall asleep first because Ravenclaw always strokes my hair and I snuggle into them until I finally do.

Ravenclaw: I always disassociate and have an existential crisis, so I never actually know.

reblog.comment:
Gryffindor: Why do you guys wake up so late? What time do you even sleep?

Hufflepuff: I fall asleep first because Ravenclaw always strokes my hair and I snuggle into them until I finally do.

Ravenclaw: I always disassociate and have an existential crisis, so I never actually know.

trail.content_raw:
Gryffindor: Why do you guys wake up so late? What time do you even sleep?

Hufflepuff: I fall asleep first because Ravenclaw always strokes my hair and I snuggle into them until I finally do.

Ravenclaw: I always disassociate and have an existential crisis, so I never actually know.
trail.content:
Gryffindor: Why do you guys wake up so late? What time do you even sleep?

Hufflepuff: I fall asleep first because Ravenclaw always strokes my hair and I snuggle into them until I finally do.

Ravenclaw: I always disassociate and have an existential crisis, so I never actually know.

title: First
body:
by Duchess_of_Strumpetness

Harry & Ginny share their first kiss in front of all their Gryffindor housemates

Written for the Drarry 30 days of kissing challenge

Words: 300, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 17 of Drarry 30 Days of Kissing

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Ginny Weasley, Ron Weasley, Dean Thomas
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley
  • Additional Tags: Community: DRARRY : Fanfiction and Fanart Facebook Group, Drarry 30 days of kissing challenge, First Kiss, Gryffindor Common Room

Read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NIRD9V

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary: The Daily Snitch: Weekend Edition: September 2, 2018 Follow the Daily Snitch on LJ, DW, IJ, and on tumblr. Joanne K. Rowling: •...
caption:
The Daily Snitch: Weekend Edition: September 2, 2018

Follow the Daily Snitch on LJ, DW, IJ, and on tumblr.

Joanne K. Rowling:
• A Lethal White ‘White Horse’ Round-Up: An Explanation of ‘Heroin Dark Lord’.
• Go Back to Hogwarts with J.K. Rowling and the Cast and Crew of “Crimes of Grindelwald”!
• J.K. Rowling on ‘sentimental’ return to Hogwarts in new 'Fantastic Beasts’ 2 feature

Harry Potter – Actors and Movies:
• The Protego Foundation offers merch signed by Evanna Lynch (Luna Lovegood-signed poster), Robbie Jarvis (young James Potter-signed wand) and others in fundraiser campaign.

Fantastic Beasts – Actors and Movies:
• 'Crimes of Grindelwald’ named most anticipated fall film.
• Eddie Redmayne, Jude Law, 'Fantastic Beasts’ cast celebrate the return to Hogwarts
• More ‘Crimes of Grindelwald ‘ Funko Figures Coming Soon!
• Potter Fans Celebrate ‘Back to Hogwarts’ and Get a Fantastic Surprise at King’s Cross!

HP & The Cursed Child – Actors and Stage:
• 'Harry Potter and the Cursed Child’ Australian cast announced, previews start January
• Melbourne “Cursed Child” Cast Announced
• Cast Announced for ‘Cursed Child’ Melbourne

Pottermore News
• Pottermore is offering free access to 'Sorcerer’s Stone’ ebook in public libraries for two weeks.(North America only)

Prompt Challenges:
• hp_unfaithful posted the September Prompt: Ambiguous
• hphet posted Challenge 9: Charles Bukowski quote
• death_eaters posted September prompts: bats wings, Lucius Malfoy and Purple.
• hp_creatures posted August Round-up and September prompts: 1. Animagus, 2. Lust, 3. Younger
• enchanted_jae posted JAE’S MONTHLY DRABBLE CHALLENGE # 151: “How do you like it?”.
• hogwarts365 posted Prompt # 259 (due on or before September 8): “Color is a power which directly influences the soul.” ~Wassily Kandinsky, Cheeky and Fluke.

Communities:
• hp_podfic_fest: : mod post: greatest apologies. The start of the fest has been moved to Monday, September 3.
• slythindor100: : announce their new tumblr and the collection on AO3.
• smutty_claus: : Sign-ups for this year’s round of the Smutty Claus fannish het "Secret Santa” exchange.
• hd_writers: : Seasonal Comment-a-thon and Write-a-thon.
• dramione_remix: Four More Days…

Masterlists and Weekly Round-ups:

• hogwarts365: posted the Prompt 258 Masterlist.

Fandom Recs:

• toblass recced one gen Snape art.
• themightyflynn recced one gen Lucius, Draco art.
• milotzi recced one Severus/Minerva fic.

• Mikaela wrote Why Hermione is not a Ravenclaw.
• Quantum Harry the Podcast: Episode 24: Disarmed and Ready.

General Fandom News:

Nifty:

trail.content:
The Daily Snitch: Weekend Edition: September 2, 2018

Follow the Daily Snitch on LJ, DW, IJ, and on tumblr.

Joanne K. Rowling:
• A Lethal White ‘White Horse’ Round-Up: An Explanation of ‘Heroin Dark Lord’.
• Go Back to Hogwarts with J.K. Rowling and the Cast and Crew of “Crimes of Grindelwald”!
• J.K. Rowling on ‘sentimental’ return to Hogwarts in new 'Fantastic Beasts’ 2 feature

Harry Potter – Actors and Movies:
• The Protego Foundation offers merch signed by Evanna Lynch (Luna Lovegood-signed poster), Robbie Jarvis (young James Potter-signed wand) and others in fundraiser campaign.

• Eddie Redmayne, Jude Law, 'Fantastic Beasts’ cast celebrate the return to Hogwarts
• More ‘Crimes of Grindelwald ‘ Funko Figures Coming Soon!

HP & The Cursed Child – Actors and Stage:

• hogwarts365 posted Prompt # 259 (due on or before September 8): “Color is a power which directly influences the soul.” ~Wassily Kandinsky, Cheeky and Fluke.

blog.name: tripps42
blog.title: Senza filtro.
blog.description: Sono Tripps. 24 anni. Studentessa in perenne crisi.

title: Yer a wizard tag!
body:
Rules: Answer the 15 questions, and tag however many or few you’d like.  

1) What Hogwarts House were you sorted into?

Quando uscì Pottermore, quindi credo 2011 o 2012, mi misero in Tassorosso. Quando è cambiato il sito ho rifatto il test e sono stata smistata in Corvonero, e mi sento più a mio agio in Corvonero.

2) If you could have any magical beast as a pet, what would it be?

Resterei col gatto senza dubbio.

3) Choose a magical mode of travel:

Flying car | Flu powder | Disapparation | Broom | Vanishing cabinet

4) Hogwarts is hiring; choose a position to apply for:

Gamekeeper | Librarian | Quidditch Referee/Flying Instructor | Defense Against the Dark Arts Teacher

5) Harry Potter’s spell of choice was expelliarmus, what do you think yours would be?

Expecto Patronum!

6) Pumpkin juice or butterbeer.

7) You have a vial of Felix Felicis for a day. What would you do?

Domani ho un esame, quindi fai un po’ te.

8) You need somewhere quiet to read, you go to:

The Owlery | Hagrid’s Hut | The Room of Requirement | The library | The Shrieking Shack.

9) Sort one of your favourite non-HP character into a house.

Aria Montgomery da Pretty Little Liars, starebbe sicuramente in Serpeverde.

10) What would your boggart be? And what would you change it to?

Probabilmente il mio molliccio diventerebbe il demone rosso del cazzo di Insidious, perché non è che abbia paura di qualcosa di concreto in particolare. Lo farei diventare un palloncino rosso che si gonfia fino a scoppiare.

11) Would you rather:

Be petrified, Regrow bone, or be Attacked by Cornish pixies

12) “Oh dear, we are in trouble”, pick a punishment:

Writing lines with Umbridge | Going with Hagrid into the dark forest | Signing fan mail for hours on end.

13) The mirror of Erised shows the viewer’s heart’s desire: What would you see if you stood before the mirror today?

Mi vedrei con una valigia probabilmente, perché mi piacerebbe viaggiare molto intorno al mondo.

14) You can resurrect one character, who would it be and why?

Severus Piton perché è stata una morte dettata dal sacrificio.

15) Share a Harry Potter-related gif that is representative of your life at the moment:

Taggo: @comelefenici, @unamatta, @frangipesca, @latte-ebiscotti, @fiatosprecato

summary:
Bill has friends his own age.
We aren’t Bill’s best buds.
Bill only hangs out with us to break curses.
Bill is one of the most...
body:
Bill has friends his own age.

We aren’t Bill’s best buds.

Bill only hangs out with us to break curses.

Bill is one of the most popular kids in school.

Obviously we’re Bill’s only friends hA
